00066 int clUnstructured2D::CreateInitialGrid(void)
00067 {
00068   try
00069   {
00070     int entry = 0;
00071 
00072     // First setup nodes of enbounding box
00073     entry+=AddNode(-400.0f, -400.0f);
00074     entry+=AddNode(+400.0f, -400.0f);
00075     entry+=AddNode(+400.0f, +400.0f);
00076     entry+=AddNode(-400.0f, +400.0f);
00077 
00078     if(entry!=10)
00079     {
00080       char message[MESLEN];
00081       sprintf(message, "Entry total does not match.\n  TOTAL=%d [10]", entry);
00082       throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured2D", "CreateInitialGrid", message);
00083     }
00084 
00085     // Setup the elements
00086     entry=0;
00087     {int nodes[]={1, -1, 2}; int faces[]={-1, 6, -1};
00088     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 1
00089 
00090     {int nodes[]={2, -1, 3}; int faces[]={-1, 6, -1};
00091     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 2
00092 
00093     {int nodes[]={3, -1, 4}; int faces[]={-1, 5, -1};
00094     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 3
00095 
00096     {int nodes[]={4, -1, 1}; int faces[]={-1, 5, -1};
00097     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 4
00098 
00099     {int nodes[]={1, 3, 4}; int faces[]={3, 4, 6};
00100     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 5
00101 
00102     {int nodes[]={1, 2, 3}; int faces[]={2, 5, 1};
00103     entry+=AddElement(faces, nodes);} // 6
00104 
00105     if(entry!=21)
00106     {
00107       char message[MESLEN];
00108       sprintf(message, "Entry total does not match.\n  TOTAL=%d [21]", entry);
00109       throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured2D", "CreateInitialGrid", message);
00110     }
00111 
00112     // Protect Halo nodes
00113     for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00114     {
00115       clNode2D* theNode = GetNodePointer(n);
00116       theNode->SetProtection();
00117     }
00118 
00119     // Protect Halo cells
00120     for(int e=0; e<GetNumberElements(); e++)
00121     {
00122       clTriangle* theElement = GetElementPointer(e);
00123       if(e<4)
00124       {
00125         theElement->SetHalo();
00126       }
00127       else
00128       {
00129         theElement->ResetHalo();
00130       }
00131     }
00132 
00133     CheckGrid();
00134   }
00135 
00136   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00137   {
00138     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::CreateInitialGrid");
00139     throw EX;
00140   }
00141 
00142   return(GetNumberElements());
00143 }
00144 
00145 void clUnstructured2D::DeleteInitialGrid()
00146 {
00147   try
00148   {
00149     // Delete the initial nodes
00150     for(int nodeID=1; nodeID<5; nodeID++)
00151     {
00152       int       nodeIndex = GetNodeIndex(nodeID);
00153       clNode2D *node      = GetNodePointer(nodeIndex);
00154 
00155       // Delete all elements tha contain this node
00156       while(node->GetNumberElements()>0)
00157       {
00158         int elementID = node->GetElementID(0);
00159 
00160         // Identify all neighbour elements as boundary cells
00161         int         elementIndex = GetElementIndex(elementID);
00162         clTriangle *element      = GetElementPointer(elementIndex);
00163 
00164         for(int neighbourIndex=0; neighbourIndex<element->GetNumberFaces(); neighbourIndex++)
00165         {
00166           int neighbourID = element->GetNeighbourID(neighbourIndex);
00167           if(neighbourID!=-1)
00168           {
00169             int         neighbourEntry = GetElementIndex(neighbourID);
00170             clTriangle *neighbour      = GetElementPointer(neighbourEntry);
00171 
00172             neighbour->SetBoundary();
00173           }
00174         }
00175 
00176         DeleteElement(elementID);
00177       }
00178 
00179       DeleteNode(nodeID);
00180     }
00181   }
00182 
00183   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00184   {
00185     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::DeleteInitialGrid");
00186     throw EX;
00187   }
00188 }
00189 
00190 int clUnstructured2D::FindEnclosingElement(const clNode2D *node)
00191 {
00192   //
00193   // IN : pointer to new node
00194   // OUT: elementID = ID of the element enclosing the new node
00195   //
00196 
00197   int         elementID  = -1;
00198   int         elementIndex;
00199   clTriangle *element;
00200 
00201   try
00202   {
00203     //Start with last element
00204     int returnID         = GetElementPointer(GetNumberElements()-1)->GetNumberID();
00205     int endlessLoopCheck = -1;
00206 
00207     while(elementID != returnID)
00208     {
00209       if(endlessLoopCheck == returnID)
00210       {
00211         // Programme is hanging in an endless loop
00212         char message[MESLEN];
00213         sprintf(message, "Programme hanging in an ENDLESS LOOP\n    1ST ELEMENTID = %d\n    2ND ELEMENTID = %d", endlessLoopCheck, elementID);
00214         throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured2D", "FindEnclosingElement", message);
00215       }
00216 
00217       endlessLoopCheck = elementID;
00218       elementID        = returnID;
00219       elementIndex     = GetElementIndex(elementID);
00220       element          = GetElementPointer(elementIndex);
00221 
00222       if(element->IsHalo())
00223       {
00224         // Current tetrahedron is a halo cell, search for neighbour
00225         int f=0;
00226         while(f<element->GetNumberFaces() && element->GetNeighbourID(f)==-1)
00227         {
00228           f++;
00229         }
00230 
00231         if(f>=element->GetNumberFaces())
00232         {
00233           char message[MESLEN];
00234           sprintf(message, "Could not find valid neighbour for halo cell.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", element->GetNumberID());
00235           throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured2D", "FindEnclosingElement", message);
00236         }
00237 
00238         // Return ID of one of the neighbouring tetrahedrons
00239         returnID = element->GetNeighbourID(f);
00240       }
00241       else
00242       {
00243         // Check if node is in current element
00244         returnID = element->IsNodeInElement(node);
00245       }
00246     }
00247 
00248     if(element->IsHalo())
00249     {
00250       char string[MESLEN];
00251       sprintf(string, "Found element is HaloCell\n ID = %d", elementID);
00252       throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured2D", "FindEnclosingElement", string);
00253     }
00254   }
00255 
00256   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00257   {
00258     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::FindEnclosingElement");
00259     throw EX;
00260   }
00261 
00262   return(elementID);
00263 }
00264 
00265 void clUnstructured2D::FindAffectedElements_Simple(const int theElementID, tpList<int> *deleteList, tpList<int> *neighbourList, tpList<int> *neighbourFaceList)
00266 {
00267   //
00268   //  IN : theElementID      = the element which encloses the new node
00269   //  OUT: deleteList        = list containing the ID's of all affected elements
00270   //       neighbourList     = list containing the ID's of all new neighbour elements
00271   //       neighbourFaceList = list containing the entries of the affected neighbour faces.
00272   //
00273 
00274   try
00275   {
00276     // Retrieve the element
00277     int         theElementIndex = GetElementIndex(theElementID);
00278     clTriangle *theElement      = GetElementPointer(theElementIndex);
00279 
00280     // Add element to deleteList
00281     deleteList->AddItem(theElementID);
00282 
00283     // Push current neighbours of element on stack for checking
00284     for(int f=0; f<theElement->GetNumberFaces(); f++)
00285     {
00286       int         theNeighbourID    = theElement->GetNeighbourID(f);
00287       int         theNeighbourIndex = GetElementIndex(theNeighbourID);
00288       clTriangle* theNeighbour      = GetElementPointer(theNeighbourIndex);
00289 
00290       neighbourList->AddItem(theNeighbourID);
00291 
00292       for(int ff=0; ff<theNeighbour->GetNumberFaces(); ff++)
00293       {
00294         if(theNeighbour->GetNeighbourID(ff)==theElementID)
00295         {
00296           neighbourFaceList->AddItem(ff);
00297         }
00298       }
00299     }
00300 
00301   }
00302 
00303   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00304   {
00305     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::FindAffectedElements_Simple");
00306     throw EX;
00307   }
00308 }
00309 
00310 void clUnstructured2D::FindAffectedElements_Advanced(const int theElementID, const clNode2D *theNode, tpList<int> *theDeleteList, tpList<int> *theNeighbourList, tpList<int> *theFaceList)
00311 {
00312   //
00313   //  IN : theElementID      = the element which encloses the new node
00314   //       theNode           = pointer to the new node; for checking the In-Sphere Criterion
00315   //  OUT: theDeleteList     = list containing the ID's of all affected elements
00316   //       theNeighbourList  = list containing the ID's of all new neighbour elements
00317   //       theFaceList       = list containg the indices of the affected neighbour faces (in neighbour system).
00318   //
00319 
00320   try
00321   {
00322     tpStack<int> searchStack;
00323     tpStack<int> faceStack;
00324 
00325     faceStack.Push(0);
00326     searchStack.Push(theElementID);
00327     while(!searchStack.IsEmpty())
00328     {
00329       // Pop from stack until stack is empty
00330       int theFaceIndex = faceStack.Pop();
00331       int theElementID = searchStack.Pop();
00332 
00333       // Create pointer to the popped element
00334       int         theElementIndex = GetElementIndex(theElementID);
00335       clTriangle *theElement      = GetElementPointer(theElementIndex);
00336 
00337       // Check if the node falls within the circumcircle of the element
00338       if(!theElement->IsHalo() && theElement->InCircleCriterion(theNode))
00339       {
00340         // Check if element was already added to deleteList
00341         int i = theDeleteList->GetIndex(theElementID);
00342         if(i<0)
00343         {
00344           // Not yet added to deleteList; add element to deleteList
00345           theDeleteList->AddItem(theElementID);
00346 
00347           // Push current neighbours of element on stack for checking for In-Sphere criterion
00348           for(int n=0; n<theElement->GetNumberFaces(); n++)
00349           {
00350             int theNeighbourID = theElement->GetNeighbourID(n);
00351             if(theNeighbourID!=-1)
00352             {
00353               int         theNeighbourIndex = GetElementIndex(theNeighbourID);
00354               clTriangle *theNeighbour      = GetElementPointer(theNeighbourIndex);
00355 
00356               searchStack.Push(theNeighbourID);
00357               faceStack.Push(theNeighbour->FindFaceIndex(theElementID));
00358             }
00359           }
00360         }
00361       }
00362       else
00363       {
00364         // This is an unaffected element (either haloCell or node does not fulfill InCircleCriterion)
00365         // Check if not already added to lists
00366         int i = theNeighbourList->GetIndex(theElementID);
00367         if((i<0) || ((i>=0)&&(theFaceList->GetItem(i)!=theFaceIndex)))
00368         {
00369           // Add to neighbourList
00370           theNeighbourList->AddItem(theElementID);
00371           theFaceList->AddItem(theFaceIndex);
00372         }
00373         else
00374         {
00375           // Strange, seems two elements fight for the same neighbour and same neighbour face
00376           char message[MESLEN];
00377           sprintf(message, "Duplicate entry in theNeighbourList/theFaceList.\n    ELEMENTID = %d\n    FACEENTRY = %d", theElementID, theFaceIndex);
00378           throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured2D", "FindAffectedElements", message);
00379         }
00380       }
00381     }
00382 
00383     // Perform a check
00384     if(theDeleteList->GetNumberItems()==0)
00385     {
00386       char message[MESLEN];
00387       sprintf(message, "Empty deleteList.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", theElementID);
00388       throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured2D", "FindAffectedElements", message);
00389     }
00390 
00391     if(theNeighbourList->GetNumberItems()==0)
00392     {
00393       char message[MESLEN];
00394       sprintf(message, "Empty neighbourList.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", theElementID);
00395       throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured2D", "FindAffectedElements", message);
00396     }
00397 
00398     if(theFaceList->GetNumberItems()==0)
00399     {
00400       char message[MESLEN];
00401       sprintf(message, "Empty faceList.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", theElementID);
00402       throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured2D", "FindAffectedElements", message);
00403     }
00404   }
00405 
00406   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00407   {
00408     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::FindAffectedElements");
00409     throw EX;
00410   }
00411 }
00412 
00413 int clUnstructured2D::InsertNode(const clNode2D theNode)
00414 {
00415   //
00416   // IN : theNode   = the new node that must be inserted
00417   // OUT: theNodeID = the ID number of the newly inserted node
00418   //
00419 
00420   int theNodeID;
00421 
00422   try
00423   {
00424     tpList<int> theDeleteList;    // ID's of all elements to be deleted
00425     tpList<int> theNeighbourList; // ID's of all new neighbour elements
00426     tpList<int> theFaceList;      // Indices of affected neighbour faces
00427 
00428     // Find the affected elements
00429     int theElementID = FindEnclosingElement(&theNode);
00430     FindAffectedElements_Advanced(theElementID, &theNode, &theDeleteList, &theNeighbourList, &theFaceList);
00431 
00432     // Debug info
00433 //    cout << "Primary suspected element: " << theElementID << endl << endl;
00434 //    cout << "Number of elements to be deleted: " << theDeleteList.GetNumberItems() << endl;
00435 //    cout << "Elements are:" << endl;
00436 //    for(int i=0; i<theDeleteList.GetNumberItems(); i++) cout << theDeleteList(i) << " ";
00437 //    cout << endl << endl;
00438 //
00439 //    cout << "Number of neighbour elements: " << theNeighbourList.GetNumberItems() << endl;
00440 //    cout << "Elements are:" << endl;
00441 //    for(int j=0; j<theNeighbourList.GetNumberItems(); j++) cout << theNeighbourList(j) << " ";
00442 //    cout << endl << endl;
00443 //
00444 //    cout << "Faces are:" << endl;
00445 //    for(int k=0; k<theFaceList.GetNumberItems(); k++) cout << theFaceList(k) << " ";
00446 //    cout << endl << endl;
00447 
00448     // Delete all indicated elements
00449     for(int d=0; d<theDeleteList.GetNumberItems(); d++)
00450     {
00451       int dd = theDeleteList(d);
00452       DeleteElement(dd);
00453     }
00454 
00455     // Insert the new node
00456     theNodeID = AddNode(theNode);
00457 
00458     // Connect the new elements to the found neighbours
00459     tpList<int> theNewElementIDs;
00460     for(int n=0; n<theNeighbourList.GetNumberItems(); n++)
00461     {
00462       int          theNeighbourID    = theNeighbourList(n);
00463       int          theNeighbourIndex = GetElementIndex(theNeighbourID);
00464       clTriangle  *theNeighbour      = GetElementPointer(theNeighbourIndex);
00465 
00466       int theFaceNodes[2];
00467       int theNeighbourFaceIndex = theFaceList(n);
00468       theNeighbour->GetFaceNodes(theNeighbourFaceIndex, theFaceNodes);
00469 
00470       // Nodes can already be resolved, so fill
00471       int theNodeIDs[3];
00472       theNodeIDs[0] = theNodeID;
00473       theNodeIDs[1] = theNeighbour->GetNodeID(theFaceNodes[1]);
00474       theNodeIDs[2] = theNeighbour->GetNodeID(theFaceNodes[0]);
00475 
00476       // Only 1 neighbour element is known, so rest is set to -1
00477       int theNeighbourIDs[] = {theNeighbourID, -1, -1};
00478 
00479       // Create the new element
00480       int theNewElementID = AddElement(theNeighbourIDs, theNodeIDs);
00481       theNewElementIDs.AddItem(theNewElementID);
00482 
00483       // Make neighbour refer to the new element
00484       theNeighbour->SetNeighbourID(theNeighbourFaceIndex, theNewElementID);
00485 
00486       // Debug info
00487 //      cout << "Connecting " << theNewElementID << ".0 to element " << theNeighbourID << "." << theNeighbourFaceIndex << endl;
00488     }
00489 
00490     // Connect the new elements to each other
00491     ConnectNewElements(&theNewElementIDs);
00492   }
00493 
00494   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00495   {
00496     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::InsertNode");
00497     throw EX;
00498   }
00499 
00500   return(theNodeID);
00501 }
00502 
00503 void clUnstructured2D::ConnectNewElements(tpList<int> *newElementIDs)
00504 {
00505   //
00506   // IN : newElementIDs = pointer to list containing all newly created element
00507   // OUT: -
00508   //
00509 
00510   try
00511   {
00512     while(newElementIDs->GetNumberItems()>0)
00513     {
00514       int         activeID      = newElementIDs->GetItem(0);
00515       int         activeIndex   = GetElementIndex(activeID);
00516       clTriangle* activeElement = GetElementPointer(activeIndex);
00517 
00518       // Clear from being haloCell
00519       activeElement->ResetHalo();
00520 
00521       // Check the number of already connected faces
00522 //      cout << endl;
00523 
00524       int numberConnected = 0;
00525       for(int f=0; f<activeElement->GetNumberFaces() ; f++)
00526       {
00527         if(activeElement->GetNeighbourID(f)!=-1)
00528         {
00529 //          cout << activeID << "." << f << " connected to " << activeElement->GetNeighbourID(f) << "     \t[EXISTING CONNECTION]" << endl;
00530           numberConnected++;
00531         }
00532       }
00533 
00534       // Delete element from list; not required anymore
00535       newElementIDs->DeleteItem(0);
00536 
00537       // Loop through remaining list to find neighbour
00538       int  i      = 0;
00539       bool succes = false;
00540       while(i<newElementIDs->GetNumberItems() && numberConnected<activeElement->GetNumberFaces())
00541       {
00542         int         passiveID      = newElementIDs->GetItem(i);
00543         int         passiveIndex   = GetElementIndex(passiveID);
00544         clTriangle* passiveElement = GetElementPointer(passiveIndex);
00545 
00546         // Find neighbour face connnection
00547         int activeFace  = 0;
00548         int passiveFace = 0;
00549         succes = FindFaceConnection(activeID, passiveID, activeFace, passiveFace);
00550 
00551         if(succes && activeElement->GetNeighbourID(activeFace)==-1)
00552         {
00553           // Establish the connection
00554           activeElement->SetNeighbourID(activeFace, passiveID);
00555           passiveElement->SetNeighbourID(passiveFace, activeID);
00556 
00557           // Debug info
00558 //          cout << activeID << "." << activeFace << " connected to " << passiveID << "." << passiveFace << "     \t[NEW CONNECTION]" << endl;
00559 
00560           numberConnected++;
00561         }
00562 
00563         i++;
00564       }
00565 
00566       if(numberConnected<activeElement->GetNumberFaces())
00567       {
00568 //        for(int i=0; i<activeElement->GetNumberFaces(); i++) cout << "FACE " << i<< " CONNECTED TO " << activeElement->GetNeighbourID(i) << endl;
00569         char message[MESLEN];
00570         sprintf(message, "Could not establish a connection.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", activeID);
00571         throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured2D", "ConnectNewElements", message);
00572       }
00573     }
00574   }
00575 
00576   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00577   {
00578     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::ConnectNewElements");
00579     throw EX;
00580   }
00581 }
00582 
00583 bool clUnstructured2D::FindFaceConnection(const int masterID, const int slaveID, int &masterFace, int &slaveFace)
00584 {
00585   //
00586   // IN : masterID   = ID of master element
00587   //      slaveID    = ID of slave element
00588   // OUT: masterFace = face entry of master element referring to slave element
00589   //      slaveFace  = face entry of slave element referring to master element
00590   // OUT: ret        = TRUE if a connection was found
00591   //                   FALSE if no connection was found
00592   //
00593 
00594   bool ret = false;
00595 
00596   try
00597   {
00598     // Find the element entries
00599     int masterEntry = GetElementIndex(masterID);
00600     int slaveEntry  = GetElementIndex(slaveID);
00601 
00602     // Retrieve the elements
00603     clTriangle *masterElement = GetElementPointer(masterEntry);
00604     clTriangle *slaveElement  = GetElementPointer(slaveEntry);
00605 
00606     // Loop through all faces of the master element
00607     masterFace=0;
00608     while(masterFace<masterElement->GetNumberFaces() && !ret)
00609     {
00610       // Retrieve the entries to the master face nodes
00611       int masterFaceNodes[masterElement->GetNumberFaceNodes()];
00612       masterElement->GetFaceNodes(masterFace, masterFaceNodes);
00613 
00614       // Retrieve the ID's of the master face nodes
00615       int masterNodeIDs[masterElement->GetNumberFaceNodes()];
00616       for(int n=0; n<masterElement->GetNumberFaceNodes(); n++)
00617       {
00618         masterNodeIDs[n]=masterElement->GetNodeID(masterFaceNodes[n]);
00619       }
00620 
00621       // Loop through all faces of the slave element
00622       slaveFace=0;
00623       while(slaveFace<slaveElement->GetNumberFaces() && !ret)
00624       {
00625         // Retrieve the entries to the slave face nodes
00626         int slaveFaceNodes[slaveElement->GetNumberFaceNodes()];
00627         slaveElement->GetFaceNodes(slaveFace, slaveFaceNodes);
00628 
00629         // Retrieve the ID's of the slave face nodes
00630         int slaveNodeIDs[slaveElement->GetNumberFaceNodes()];
00631         for(int nn=0; nn<slaveElement->GetNumberFaceNodes(); nn++)
00632         {
00633           slaveNodeIDs[nn]=slaveElement->GetNodeID(slaveFaceNodes[nn]);
00634         }
00635 
00636         // Check if the master face is equal to the slave face
00637         if(IsEqualFace(masterNodeIDs, slaveNodeIDs))
00638         {
00639           ret=true;
00640         }
00641 
00642         slaveFace++;
00643       }
00644 
00645       masterFace++;
00646     }
00647     slaveFace--;
00648     masterFace--;
00649 
00650     if(slaveFace>=slaveElement->GetNumberFaces() || masterFace>=masterElement->GetNumberFaces())
00651     {
00652       char message[MESLEN];
00653       sprintf(message, "Invalid face(s) found.\n    MASTERFACE = %d\n    SLAVEFACE  = %d", masterFace, slaveFace);
00654       throw clException("clUnstructured2D", "FindFaceConnection", message);
00655     }
00656   }
00657 
00658   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00659   {
00660     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::FindFaceConnection");
00661     throw EX;
00662   }
00663 
00664   return(ret);
00665 }
00666 
00667 bool clUnstructured2D::IsEqualFace(const int *masterNodeIDs, const int *slaveNodeIDs)
00668 {
00669   //
00670   // IN : masterNodeIDs = array containing the ID numbers of the nodes of the master face
00671   //      slaveNodeIDs  = array containing the ID numbers of the nodes of the slave face
00672   // OUT: ret = TRUE if current master face is equal to slave face
00673   //            FALSE if current master face is not equal to slave face
00674   //
00675 
00676   bool ret = false;
00677 
00678   try
00679   {
00680     int numberConnectedNodes=0;
00681 
00682     //TODO: Make more general instead of hardcoding '2' faceNodes
00683     for(int i=0; i<2; i++)
00684     {
00685       for(int j=0; j<2; j++)
00686       {
00687         if(masterNodeIDs[i]==slaveNodeIDs[j]) numberConnectedNodes++;
00688       }
00689     }
00690 
00691     //TODO: Make more general instead of hardcoding '2' faceNodes
00692     if(numberConnectedNodes==2) ret=true;
00693   }
00694 
00695   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00696   {
00697     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::IsEqualFace");
00698     throw EX;
00699   }
00700 
00701   return(ret);
00702 }
00703 
00704 void clUnstructured2D::CorrectGrid(void)
00705 {
00706   try
00707   {
00708     CorrectInCircleCriterion();
00709   }
00710 
00711   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00712   {
00713     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::CorrectGrid");
00714     throw EX;
00715   }
00716 }
00717 
00718 void clUnstructured2D::CorrectInCircleCriterion(void)
00719 {
00720   try
00721   {
00722     int e = 0;
00723     while(e<GetNumberElements())
00724     {
00725       clTriangle* element = GetElementPointer(e);
00726 
00727       // Loop through all nodes
00728       for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00729       {
00730         clNode2D* node = GetNodePointer(n);
00731 
00732 //        cout << "Checking node " << node->GetNumberID() << " against element " << element->GetNumberID() << endl;
00733 
00734         bool repairElement = true;
00735         repairElement = repairElement && !element->IsHalo();
00736         repairElement = repairElement && !element->IsElementNode(node->GetNumberID());
00737         repairElement = repairElement &&  element->InCircleCriterion(node);
00738 
00739         if(repairElement)
00740         {
00741           clNode2D    centroid  = element->GetCentroid();
00742           clNode2D   *lastNode  = GetNodePointer(GetNumberNodes()-1);
00743           int         newNodeID = lastNode->GetNumberID()+1;
00744 
00745           clNode2D    newNode(newNodeID, centroid.GetCoordinates());
00746           newNodeID = InsertNode(newNode);
00747 
00748           // Debugging
00749 //          cout << "Corrected element: " << element->GetNumberID() << endl;
00750 
00751           // Restart at beginning
00752           e=-1;
00753           n=GetNumberNodes();
00754         }
00755       }
00756 
00757       e++;
00758     }
00759   }
00760 
00761   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00762   {
00763     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::CorrectInCircleCriterion");
00764     throw EX;
00765   }
00766 }
00767 
00768 bool clUnstructured2D::CheckGrid(void)
00769 {
00770   bool ret=true;
00771 
00772   try
00773   {
00774     // Check initial grid
00775     ret = ret && CheckElementConnections();
00776     ret = ret && CheckNodeConnections();
00777     ret = ret && CheckElementAreas();
00778     ret = ret && CheckInCircleCriterion();
00779   }
00780 
00781   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00782   {
00783     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::CheckGrid");
00784     throw EX;
00785   }
00786 
00787   return(ret);
00788 }
00789 
00790 bool clUnstructured2D::CheckElementAreas(void)
00791 {
00792   bool ret=true;
00793 
00794   try
00795   {
00796     // Loop through all elements
00797     for(int e=0; e<GetNumberElements(); e++)
00798     {
00799       clTriangle* theElement = GetElementPointer(e);
00800 
00801       if(!theElement->IsHalo() && theElement->GetArea()<=PRECISION)
00802       {
00803         ret=false;
00804 
00805         char message[MESLEN];
00806         sprintf(message, "Detected element with zero or negative volume.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", theElement->GetNumberID());
00807         throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured2D", "CheckElementAreas", message);
00808       }
00809     }
00810   }
00811 
00812   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00813   {
00814     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::CheckElementAreas");
00815     throw EX;
00816   }
00817 
00818   return(ret);
00819 }
00820 
00821 bool clUnstructured2D::CheckInCircleCriterion(void)
00822 {
00823   bool ret=true;
00824 
00825   try
00826   {
00827     // Loop through all elements
00828     for(int e=0; e<GetNumberElements(); e++)
00829     {
00830       clTriangle* element = GetElementPointer(e);
00831 
00832       // Loop through all nodes
00833       for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00834       {
00835         clNode2D* node = GetNodePointer(n);
00836 
00837         // Check node is not part of element
00838         int  i     = 0;
00839         bool found = false;
00840         while(i<element->GetNumberNodes() && !found)
00841         {
00842           if(element->GetNodeID(i) == node->GetNumberID())
00843           {
00844             found = true;
00845           }
00846 
00847           i++;
00848         }
00849 
00850         if(!element->IsHalo() && !found && element->InCircleCriterion(node))
00851         {
00852           ret=false;
00853 
00854           char message[MESLEN];
00855           sprintf(message, "Detected node breaching in-sphere criterion.\n    ELEMENTID = %d\n    NODEID      = %d", element->GetNumberID(), node->GetNumberID());
00856           throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured2D", "CheckInSphereCriterion", message);
00857         }
00858       }
00859     }
00860   }
00861 
00862   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00863   {
00864     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::CheckInSphereCriterion");
00865     throw EX;
00866   }
00867 
00868   return(ret);
00869 }
00870 
00871 bool clUnstructured2D::CheckTotalArea(void)
00872 {
00873   bool   ret=true;
00874   double totalVolume = 0.0;
00875 
00876   try
00877   {
00878     for(int e=0; e<GetNumberElements(); e++)
00879     {
00880       clTriangle* element = GetElementPointer(e);
00881       if(!element->IsHalo())
00882       {
00883         totalVolume = totalVolume + element->GetArea();
00884       }
00885     }
00886 
00887     if(fabs(totalVolume - (double)(64)) > PRECISION)
00888     {
00889       ret=false;
00890 
00891       char message[MESLEN];
00892       sprintf(message, "Total volume incorrect.\n    VOLUME = %f [64.00]", totalVolume);
00893       throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured2D", "CheckTotalVolume", message);
00894     }
00895   }
00896 
00897   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00898   {
00899     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::CheckTotalVolume");
00900     throw EX;
00901   }
00902 
00903   return(ret);
00904 }

00920 /***************************************************************
00921 ***
00922 ***   Performing Node Characteristic Operation
00923 ***
00924 **/
00925 
00926 int clUnstructured2D::AddNode(const double x, const double y)
00927 {
00928   //
00929   // IN : x         = x-coordinate of new node
00930   //      y         = y-coordinate of new node
00931   // OUT: newNodeID = ID of new node
00932   //
00933 
00934   int newNodeID = 1;
00935 
00936   try
00937   {
00938     if(GetNumberNodes()>0)
00939     {
00940       clNode2D  *lastNode  = GetNodePointer(GetNumberNodes()-1);
00941       newNodeID            = lastNode->GetNumberID()+1;
00942     }
00943 
00944     clNode2D newNode(newNodeID, x, y);
00945     AddNode(newNode);
00946   }
00947 
00948   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00949   {
00950     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::AddNode");
00951     throw EX;
00952   }
00953 
00954   return(newNodeID);
00955 }
00956 
00957 int clUnstructured2D::AddNode(const double coord[2])
00958 {
00959   //
00960   // IN : coord[3]  = coordinates of new node
00961   // OUT: newNodeID = ID of new node
00962   //
00963   int newNodeID = 1;
00964 
00965   try
00966   {
00967     newNodeID = AddNode(coord[0], coord[1]);
00968   }
00969 
00970   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00971   {
00972     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::AddNode");
00973     throw EX;
00974   }
00975 
00976   return(newNodeID);
00977 }

00979 /***************************************************************
00980 ***
00981 ***  Perforing Element Characteristic Operations
00982 ***
00983 **/
00984 
00985 //TODO: Make more general instead programming '4' etc.
00986 int clUnstructured2D::AddElement(const int faces[3], const int nodes[3])
00987 {
00988   //
00989   // IN : faces         = IDs of neighbouring elements
00990   //      nodes         = IDs of nodes
00991   // OUT: newElementID  = ID of new element
00992   //
00993 
00994   int newElementID = 1;
00995 
00996   try
00997   {
00998     newElementID = AddElement(faces[0], faces[1], faces[2], nodes[0], nodes[1], nodes[2]);
00999   }
01000 
01001   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01002   {
01003     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::AddElement");
01004     throw EX;
01005   }
01006 
01007   return(newElementID);
01008 }
01009 
01010 //TODO: Make more general instead programming '4' etc.
01011 int clUnstructured2D::AddElement(const int face1, const int face2, const int face3,
01012                                  const int node1, const int node2, const int node3)
01013 {
01014   //
01015   // IN : face1         = ID of element, neighbouring the face formed by vertices V2, V3
01016   //      face2         = ID of element, neighbouring the face formed by vertices V3, V1
01017   //      face3         = ID of element, neighbouring the face formed by vertices V1, V2
01018   //      node1         = ID of node1
01019   //      node2         = ID of node2
01020   //      node3         = ID of node3
01021   // OUT: newElementID  = ID of new element
01022   //
01023 
01024   int newElementID = 1;
01025 
01026   try
01027   {
01028     if(GetNumberElements()>0)
01029     {
01030       clTriangle*  lastElement = GetElementPointer(GetNumberElements()-1);
01031       newElementID             = lastElement->GetNumberID()+1;
01032     }
01033 
01034     clTriangle newElement(this, newElementID);
01035 
01036     newElement.SetNeighbourID(0, face1);
01037     newElement.SetNeighbourID(1, face2);
01038     newElement.SetNeighbourID(2, face3);
01039 
01040     newElement.SetNodeID(0, node1);
01041     newElement.SetNodeID(1, node2);
01042     newElement.SetNodeID(2, node3);
01043 
01044     AddElement(newElement);
01045 
01046     // Add elementID to the nodes of this new element
01047     for(int n=0; n<newElement.GetNumberNodes(); n++)
01048     {
01049       int theNodeID = newElement.GetNodeID(n);
01050       if(theNodeID!=-1)
01051       {
01052         int       theNodeIndex = GetNodeIndex(theNodeID);
01053         clNode2D *theNode      = GetNodePointer(theNodeIndex);
01054 
01055         theNode->AddElementID(newElementID);
01056       }
01057 
01058       // TODO: Do similarly for neighbouring elements?
01059     }
01060 
01061 
01062   }
01063 
01064   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01065   {
01066     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::AddElement");
01067     throw EX;
01068   }
01069 
01070   return(newElementID);
01071 }
01072 
01073 void clUnstructured2D::Smooth(void)
01074 {
01075   try
01076   {
01077     tpList<int> neighbourNodeList;
01078     tpList<int> indexList;
01079 
01080     ComposeNeighbourNodeList(&neighbourNodeList, &indexList);
01081 
01082     // TODO: Nice; but doesn't do anything...
01083     BalanceNodes(&neighbourNodeList, &indexList);
01084   }
01085 
01086   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01087   {
01088     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::Smooth");
01089     throw EX;
01090   }
01091 }
01092 
01093 void clUnstructured2D::ComposeNeighbourNodeList(tpList<int> *neighbourNodeList, tpList<int> *indexList)
01094 {
01095   try
01096   {
01097     // Loop through all nodes
01098     for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++)
01099     {
01100       clNode2D *node = GetNodePointer(n);
01101 
01102       indexList->AddItem(neighbourNodeList->GetNumberItems());
01103 
01104       if(!node->IsProtected())
01105       {
01106         // Loop through all elements
01107         for(int e=0; e<node->GetNumberElements(); e++)
01108         {
01109           int         elementID    = node->GetElementID(e);
01110           int         elementIndex = GetElementIndex(elementID);
01111           clTriangle *element      = GetElementPointer(elementIndex);
01112 
01113           // Get the nodeIndex in the element system
01114           int nodeIndex = element->GetNodeIndex(node->GetNumberID());
01115 
01116           // Get the nodes of the face with faceIndex == nodeIndex (face0 opposite node0 has node1 and node2)
01117           int neighbourIndex_1 = element->GetNeighbourNode(nodeIndex, 0);
01118           int neighbourIndex_2 = element->GetNeighbourNode(nodeIndex, 1);
01119 
01120           int neighbourID_1    = element->GetNodeID(neighbourIndex_1);
01121           int neighbourID_2    = element->GetNodeID(neighbourIndex_2);
01122 
01123           neighbourNodeList->AddItem(neighbourID_1);
01124           neighbourNodeList->AddItem(neighbourID_2);
01125         }
01126       }
01127     }
01128 
01129     // Check on size of indexList
01130     if(indexList->GetNumberItems() != GetNumberNodes())
01131     {
01132       char message[MESLEN];
01133       sprintf(message, "Size of indexList incorrect\n\tSize indexList = %d [%d]", indexList->GetNumberItems(), GetNumberNodes());
01134       throw clException("clUnstructured2D", "ComposeNeighbourList", message);
01135     }
01136 
01137     // Debug Info
01138     cout << endl << "IndexList: ";
01139     for (int i=0; i<indexList->GetNumberItems(); i++) cout << indexList->GetItem(i) << " ";
01140 
01141     cout << endl << "NeighbourNodeList: ";
01142     for (int i=0; i<neighbourNodeList->GetNumberItems(); i++) cout << neighbourNodeList->GetItem(i) << " ";
01143 
01144     cout << endl;
01145   }
01146 
01147   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01148   {
01149     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::ComposeNeighbourNodeList");
01150     throw EX;
01151   }
01152 }
01153 
01154 void clUnstructured2D::BalanceNodes(tpList<int> *neighbourNodeList, tpList<int> *indexList)
01155 {
01156   try
01157   {
01158     int    iteration = 0;
01159     double omega     = 0.8f;
01160     double maxDelta  = 1000.0f;
01161 
01162     while(maxDelta>PRECISION)
01163     {
01164       iteration++;
01165       cout << "Iteration: " << iteration << " - Residual: " << maxDelta << endl;
01166 
01167       double maxDeltaX = 0.0f;
01168       double maxDeltaY = 0.0f;
01169 
01170       // Loop through all nodes
01171       for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++)
01172       {
01173         clNode2D *node = GetNodePointer(n);
01174 
01175         if(!node->IsProtected())
01176         {
01177           int       index     = indexList->GetItem(n);
01178           int       count     = 0;
01179           double    averageX  = 0.0f;
01180           double    averageY  = 0.0f;
01181 
01182           if(n<GetNumberNodes()-1)
01183           {
01184             // All nodes but last
01185             int nextIndex = indexList->GetItem(n+1);
01186 
01187             for(int nn=index; nn<nextIndex; nn++)
01188             {
01189               int       neighbourNodeID    = neighbourNodeList->GetItem(nn);
01190               int       neighbourNodeIndex = GetNodeIndex(neighbourNodeID);
01191               clNode2D *neighbourNode      = GetNodePointer(neighbourNodeIndex);
01192 
01193               averageX += neighbourNode->x();
01194               averageY += neighbourNode->y();
01195 
01196               count++;
01197             }
01198           }
01199           else
01200           {
01201             // Last node
01202             for(int nn=index; nn<GetNumberNodes(); nn++)
01203             {
01204               int       neighbourNodeID    = neighbourNodeList->GetItem(nn);
01205               int       neighbourNodeIndex = GetNodeIndex(neighbourNodeID);
01206               clNode2D *neighbourNode      = GetNodePointer(neighbourNodeIndex);
01207 
01208               averageX += neighbourNode->x();
01209               averageY += neighbourNode->y();
01210 
01211               count++;
01212             }
01213           }
01214 
01215           if(count>0)
01216           {
01217             averageX /= count;
01218             averageY /= count;
01219           }
01220 
01221           double deltaX = averageX - node->x();
01222           double deltaY = averageY - node->y();
01223 
01224           double newX = node->x() + omega*deltaX;
01225           double newY = node->y() + omega*deltaY;
01226 
01227           cout << "X = " << newX << " Y = " << newY << endl;
01228 
01229           node->SetCoordinates(newX, newY);
01230 
01231           maxDeltaX = (fabs(deltaX)>maxDeltaX ? fabs(deltaX) : maxDeltaX);
01232           maxDeltaY = (fabs(deltaY)>maxDeltaY ? fabs(deltaY) : maxDeltaY);
01233         }
01234       }
01235 
01236       double oldMaxDelta = maxDelta;
01237       maxDelta = (maxDeltaX > maxDeltaY) ? maxDeltaX : maxDeltaY;
01238 
01239       if(maxDelta>oldMaxDelta)
01240       {
01241         char message[MESLEN];
01242         sprintf(message, "Diverging after iteration = %d\n", iteration);
01243         throw clException("clUnstructured2D", "BalanceNodes", message);
01244       }
01245     }
01246   }
01247 
01248   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01249   {
01250     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::BalanceNodes");
01251     throw EX;
01252   }
01253 }
01254 
01255 void clUnstructured2D::RandomCentroidInsertion(const int numberInsertions)
01256 {
01257   try
01258   {
01259     srand((unsigned)time(NULL));
01260     //srand((unsigned)0);
01261 
01262     for(int i=0; i<numberInsertions; i++)
01263     {
01264       // Select a random tetrahedron - but not a halo tetrahedron
01265       int index = rand() % GetNumberElements();
01266 
01267       clTriangle *theElement = GetElementPointer(index);
01268       if(!theElement->IsHalo())
01269       {
01270         clNode2D  centroid  = theElement->GetCentroid();
01271         clNode2D *lastNode  = GetNodePointer(GetNumberNodes()-1);
01272         int       newNodeID = lastNode->GetNumberID()+1;
01273 
01274         clNode2D  newNode(newNodeID, centroid.GetCoordinates());
01275         newNodeID = InsertNode(newNode);
01276       }
01277       else
01278       {
01279         // Retry randomisation
01280         i--;
01281       }
01282     }
01283   }
01284 
01285   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01286   {
01287     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::RandomCentroidInsertion2D");
01288     throw EX;
01289   }
01290 }

01305 
01306 void clUnstructured2D::DumpGrid(const char* fileName)
01307 {
01308   try
01309   {
01310     fstream fout;
01311     fout.open(fileName, ios::out);
01312     fout.precision(3);
01313     if (fout.good())
01314     {
01315       // Dump all nodes with the element-references
01316       fout << "NODE ID;COORDINATES;;" << endl;
01317       for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++)
01318       {
01319         clNode2D         *node  = GetNodePointer(n);
01320         tpMatrix<double>  coord = node->GetCoordinates();
01321         fout << node->GetNumberID() << ";";
01322         fout << coord(1,1) << ";" << coord(2,1) << ";" ;
01323         fout << endl;
01324       }
01325       fout << endl;
01326 
01327       // Dump all elements with neighbour-references and node-references
01328       fout << "ELEMENT ID;AREA;NEIGHBOUR REFERENCES;;;;NODE REFERENCES;;;" << endl;
01329       for(int e=0; e<GetNumberElements(); e++)
01330       {
01331         clTriangle *element = GetElementPointer(e);
01332         if(!element->IsHalo())
01333         {
01334           fout << element->GetNumberID() << ";";
01335           fout << element->GetArea() << ";";
01336           for(int nb=0; nb<element->GetNumberFaces(); nb++)
01337           {
01338             fout << element->GetNeighbourID(nb) << ";";
01339           }
01340 
01341           for(int no=0; no<element->GetNumberNodes(); no++)
01342           {
01343             fout << element->GetNodeID(no) << ";";
01344           }
01345           fout << endl;
01346         }
01347       }
01348       fout << endl;
01349 
01350       fout.close();
01351     }
01352     else
01353     {
01354       throw clExceptionTree("clUnstructured2D", "DumpGrid", "Could not open dump-file.");
01355     }
01356   }
01357 
01358   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
01359   {
01360     EX.AddMethodToTree("clUnstructured2D::DumpGrid");
01361     throw EX;
01362   }
01363 }
